ExportKeys.name: The Lotus Eaters
ExportKeys.description: A strange call comes from beyond and must not go unanswered.

ExportKeys.name: The Hex Finale
ExportKeys.description: A chance to rewrite history and avert disaster.

ExportKeys.name: The Hex
ExportKeys.description: The desperate hunt for Albrecht Entrati has led the Drifter to the city of Höllvania on December 31st, 1999. Despite the Scaldra lockdown in the face of the Techrot menace, the citizens do their best to celebrate. But this has all happened before... and ended in disaster.

ExportKeys.name: Apostasy Prologue
ExportKeys.description: Inspect your personal quarters upon finishing the Chains of Harrow quest.

ExportKeys.name: The Archwing
ExportKeys.description: The Balor Fomorians are coming but we are ready. Through your efforts we finally have a working Archwing prototype and I am sending you the blueprint. However, your task is not yet complete. You still must discover the component parts.

ExportKeys.name: Octavia's Anthem
ExportKeys.description: Build the Mandachord and find the cause of Cephalon Suda’s erratic behavior.

ExportKeys.name: Chimera Prologue
ExportKeys.description: Investigate your personal quarters upon completion of The Sacrifice.

ExportKeys.name: The New Strange
ExportKeys.description: Work with Cephalon Simaris to find the source of a mysterious voice.

ExportKeys.name: The Duviri Paradox
ExportKeys.description: Enter the Kingdom of Duviri

ExportKeys.name: Whispers in the Walls
ExportKeys.description: Loid has had strange dreams and desperately needs to show you something.

ExportKeys.name: The Silver Grove
ExportKeys.description: New Loka seeks help protecting a sacred forest from Grineer incursions, but are they ready to face the forest’s true nature?

ExportKeys.name: A Man of Few Words
ExportKeys.description: Darvo needs your help again. Save one of his best contractors from Grineer execution.

ExportKeys.name: Saya's Vigil
ExportKeys.description: On the Plains of Eidolon a mystery has lain buried for years: one that will mend or destroy a heart, and open the door to a hidden past.

ExportKeys.name: The Jordas Precept
ExportKeys.description: Ordis is determined to help a fellow Cephalon overcome a ship wide infestation.

ExportKeys.name: The Glast Gambit
ExportKeys.description: Nef Anyo has stolen the children of the Mycona Colony and it is up to you to get them back. You must challenge Nef on The Index and beat him at his own game. But Tenno, beware, not all is as it seems.

ExportKeys.name: Mutalist Alad V Assassinate
ExportKeys.description: Put an end to Alad V and his Mutalist experiments

ExportKeys.name: Patient Zero
ExportKeys.description: Find Alad V’s laboratory and put a stop to his madness.

ExportKeys.name: Once Awake
ExportKeys.description: Intercepted Grineer communications reveal that Grineer have been experimenting with some sort of bio weapon. You must investigate.

ExportKeys.name: Heart of Deimos
ExportKeys.description: Deimos emerges in Martian orbit, completely overrun by the Infestation... yet among the writhing mass, a distress call comes over a most ancient carrier wave...

ExportKeys.name: Jade Shadows
ExportKeys.description: Struggling to understand the oldest and deepest secret from his past, Stalker finds himself allied with sworn enemies on the troubling road toward uncovering the truth… and averting an incalculable loss.

ExportKeys.name: Veilbreaker
ExportKeys.description: Daughter Entrati gets more than she bargained for when she enlists the Tenno to investigate a call for reinforcements aboard a Narmer Murex.

ExportKeys.name: Howl of the Kubrow
ExportKeys.description: You are Tenno, you deserve a Kubrow by your side.

ExportKeys.name: The Limbo Theorem
ExportKeys.description: The Limbo Theorem quest cannot be completed without an ArchwingPiece together the Limbo Theorem to uncover its source

ExportKeys.name: Hidden Messages
ExportKeys.description: Seek out the Warframe Mirage.

ExportKeys.name: Sands of Inaros
ExportKeys.description: Help Baro Ki'Teer raid an ancient Martian tomb for a mysterious treasure.

ExportKeys.name: AWAKENING
ExportKeys.description: The Tenno: monuments of an ancient warrior caste.For generations you've slept, with no call to wake you.Until now.

ExportKeys.name: The New War
ExportKeys.description: The Sentient armada has emerged from the Veil Proxima in shocking numbers.At their head, Natah, once the trusted guide 'Lotus', now seemingly in thrall to Ballas and her brother Erra.Across worlds and space, the Tenno and their unlikely alliance launch a final assault to take the Sentient mothership... where Natah awaits.

ExportKeys.name: The Second Dream
ExportKeys.description: The Sentient Hunhow seeks to destroy the Tenno by exploiting long forgotten secrets.

ExportKeys.name: Chains of Harrow
ExportKeys.description: A strange transmission leads deep into the dark world of Red Veil mysticism. What evils will be found there and what do they want?

ExportKeys.name: The Deadlock Protocol
ExportKeys.description: A power struggle within the Corpus elite has erupted. Seeking control, Nef Anyo looks to the past... to the very origins of the Corpus itself.

ExportKeys.name: Rising Tide
ExportKeys.description: To face a growing threat, a long dormant Cephalon calls on you to reconstruct an Orokin-era interceptor craft: the Railjack.

ExportKeys.name: Mask of the Revenant
ExportKeys.description: The Unum chooses Nakak to receive a strange mask. A mask that leads to even stranger visions. What lost story does the Unum want to tell?

ExportKeys.name: The Sacrifice
ExportKeys.description: A tortured vision sends the Operator on the hunt for a Warframe unlike any other.

ExportKeys.name: Natah
ExportKeys.description: Strange drones have appeared in the Origin System, help the Lotus find out what they are and who sent them.

ExportKeys.name: Vox Solaris
ExportKeys.description: Eudico would do anything to keep her people safe, but will she stand up to Nef Anyo?

ExportKeys.name: Stolen Dreams
ExportKeys.description: Find the thief Maroo and uncover the secrets of the Arcane Codices.

ExportKeys.name: Vor's Prize
ExportKeys.description: MY QUEENS -You were right, the Tenno threat is real. We found one drifting near Earth but the Lotus knew we were coming. She purged the Cryo moments before we had them and sent a squad of Tenno to break our assault.They escaped. We are working on tracing them. Separate this Tenno from the flock and it should be easy to kill. We shattered its Warframe and expect such an abrupt Cryo purge will have damaged its memories.We anxiously await punishment for failing this task.- VOR

ExportKeys.name: The War Within
ExportKeys.description: A disturbance in the Somatic Link prompts the Lotus to send operatives back to the Tenno Reservoir.

ExportKeys.name: Call of the Tempestarii
ExportKeys.description: Void Storms gather in Corpus lanes... could a mysterious vessel somehow be the cause?

ExportKeys.name: The Waverider
ExportKeys.description: When tragedy strikes, the Ventkids search for hope in a long-lost story.

ExportKeys.name: Angels of the Zariman
ExportKeys.description: From depths beyond reason a Voice had spoken, and its echoes would not be denied. No longer fully concealed by the ever-shifting Void, the Zariman now rests between worlds. A haunting song resounds across the System. It is time for an overdue confrontation with the past...

ExportKeys.name: Clan Key
ExportKeys.description: Unlocks access to your Clan's Dojo

ExportKeys.name: Mutalist Alad V Assassinate
ExportKeys.description: Put an end to Alad V and his Mutalist experiments
